description.value:
Traits Occult, Curse, Virulent

Saving Throw Fortitude

Stage 1 no ill effect (1 round)

Stage 2 the victim's skin softens, inflicting @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 the victim's skin transforms into a clear, slimy membrane, inflicting @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 2} until the curse ends; every hour this membrane remains dry, the creature's drained condition increases by 1 (permanent). A @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Remove Disease]{Remove Disease} spell can counteract this curse, but immunity to disease offers no protection against it.
